The other patient, a 63-year-old woman, experienced neutropenic sepsis and pneumonia after nine courses of pemetrexed and motexaﬁn and ultimately died of cardiogenic shock. Unfor- tunately, the 6-month progression free survival, overall sur- vival, response rate, clinical beneﬁt ratio were also similar to that which would be expected from pemetrexed as a single agent (Table 3).
